title: Widening and Improvement of  64.31 km of Roads in Central and Uva Provinces and Reconstruction of Thirteen (13) Bridges
decision_details:
- the proposal made by H.E. The President, in his capacity as the Minister of Highways, Ports and Shipping, to award the contracts for the widening and improvements to the following road sections covering a length of 64.31 km, and also for the reconstruction of 13 bridges in the Central  and Uva Provinces to a Chinese Construction Company, was approved by the Cabinet: 

		*	Kandy - Kirimatiya Road (0.0 - 7.64 km)
		*	Ampitiya - Gurudeniya Road (0.0 - 2.25 km)
		*	Nuwara Eliya - Ragala - Udupussallawa Road (19.0 - 46.0 km)
		*	Welimada - Kirklees Road (0.0 - 17.83 km)
		*	Avissawella - Hatton - Nuwara Eliya Road (98.9 - 108.49 km)
